full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=============================

**Title (English)**
------------------

PR4662_5P037-220148B Structured Light 3 Dimensional (3D) Scanners

**Title (French)**
------------------

PR4662_5P037-220148B Numériseurs tridimensionnels (3D) à lumière structurée

**Reference Number**
-------------------

WS3764220923-Doc3843183791

**Publication Date**
-------------------

January 25, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**
------------------------

February 9, 2023, 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

**Contract Period**
-------------------

Expected Start Date: January 31, 2023
Expected End Date: January 31, 2024

**Tender Status**
------------------

This tender is now expired.

**Procurement Details**
-----------------------

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Notice Type: Advance Contract Award Notice
* Procurement Method: Advance contract award notice
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Supplier Information**
-----------------------

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) in Canada, specifically 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5.

**Contact Information**
-------------------------

For more information, contact Renee Lepage at renee.lepage@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Contract Award Notice**
-------------------------

This tender was awarded exclusively by contract due to the existence of exclusive rights.

**Goods and Services Details**
-------------------------------

The successful supplier will provide Structured Light 3 Dimensional (3D) Scanners, which will be used by the Parks Canada Agency (PC).

**Document and Project Links**
------------------------------

For more information, please refer to the following links:

* [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15225351?extsite=MTUyMjUzNTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15225351?extsite=MTUyMjUzNTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Please note: I removed some redundant information, such as ditto case pairs for the French and English text when
